content:
About me. #I like doing little games and i’m learning game developing as a hobby. I develop games in lua with Love2d (https://love2d.org), and don’t have intention of making commercial games (for now).
Explore: # All posts Projects Gauntlet of Ageon Photo of my desktop. My OS is Archcraft In the footer you have links to social media and github account.
You can also check blog posts and projects.
summary:
About me. #

I like doing little games and i’m learning game developing as a hobby. I develop games in lua with Love2d (https://love2d.org), and don’t have intention of making commercial games (for now).
title: Welcome to my blog!

content:
Pong but every 30 seconds a random event happens. (wr)ong! or Wrong Pong is a pong “clone” but a random event happens every 30 seconds, from adding a third “player” that blocks the ball to altering time and space, in this game everything can happen (satire).
Github repository.
summary:
Pong but every 30 seconds a random event happens.

(wr)ong! or Wrong Pong is a pong “clone” but a random event happens every 30 seconds, from adding a third “player” that blocks the ball to altering time and space, in this game everything can happen (satire).

Github repository.
title: Wrong Pong

content:
Gauntlet of Ageon is a dungeon crawler, roguelike game inspired by Hades.
It is being developed by one person (me), and it will most likely be a free game, uploaded to itch.io.
summary:

It is being developed by one person (me), and it will most likely be a free game, uploaded to itch.io.
title: Gauntlet Of Ageon
